authors.name: Todd Birchard
authors.bio: Product manager turned engineer with an ongoing identity crisis. Breaks everything before learning best practices. Completely normal and emotionally stable.

primary_author.name: Todd Birchard
primary_author.bio: Product manager turned engineer with an ongoing identity crisis. Breaks everything before learning best practices. Completely normal and emotionally stable.

ghostPage.plaintext:
When we find a topic we hold true to our hearts, we'll occassionally cling long
enough to produce a series. These publications cover topics from start to
finish, just enough to arm readers with enough to be dangerous. We may not be a
500 dollar online bootcamp, but we do explain things like human beings, and
occasionally even drop the F bomb. Trust us, its way more fun (and perhaps
effective) to stick to something this way.
ghostPage.html: When we find a topic we hold true to our hearts, we'll occassionally cling long enough to produce a series. These publications cover topics from start to finish, just enough to arm readers with enough to be dangerous. We may not be a 500 dollar online bootcamp, but we do explain things like human beings, and occasionally even drop the F bomb. Trust us, its way more fun (and perhaps effective) to stick to something this way.
